title: Unraveling Biden's COVID Case | Daily Best of July 22 | Rick & Bubba
description:
After lying to the American people about the efficacy of the vaccine, quadruple-vaxxed Joe Biden reassures us he's going to be okay while in isolation at the White House. CNN's Van Jones admits things have gotten worse since Biden took office. A father punches a man in court who is on trial for the murder of his son, and we don't blame the father one bit. Rick and Bubba give advice on how to raise godly daughters. And lastly, Speedy tries to help but ends up breaking Rick's microphone while we are live on the air!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
